DOC.brief_summary: Glycemic index commonly use method determine effect food blood glucose . Despite carbohydrate fat content , instant noodle popular Asia , include Indonesia . Based serve method , instant noodle without soup . Studies show water content meal may influence glycemic response meal thus effect result GI measurement . However none specifically study instant noodle additional water content soup ( incorporate food matrix ) . Therefore , study aim determine whether serve method instant noodle ( without soup ) may influence glycemic response glycemic index value meal .
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Index Instant Noodle With Without Soup : Does Serving Method Have Effect ?
DOC.detailed_description: Glycemic index method perform accord Food Agricultural Organization/WHO recommendation .
